title: Manipulating non-equilibrium diffusion-controlled reaction toward reversible alloying reactions in alkali ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4929-4943
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01241K, Review Article
Gilseob Kim, Seonyong Cho, Lulu Lyu, Mihui Park, Sanghyun Park, Yong-Mook Kang
Electrochemical alloying reaction of alloying-type anode materials for alkali-ion batteries is revealed by focusing on the underlying thermodynamics.
